Unison Reasearch has concentrated all of our experience, knowledge and ambition into a small amplifierâ€”one that includes all the technology and passion that one usually finds in the finest flagship products.</p>'

    excerpt: '<p>The Primo wowed me with its ability to ally impact with resolution, and visceral dynamics with graceful detail and musicality. That it failed to resolve the deepest low-end notes with equal gumption in no way detracted from its overall appeal. Rather, the Primo delighted with its cohesive strengths, and so achieved a kind of holistic presence.</p>'
